traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: Parvaz has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Parvaz makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.
